name: tree-svg-d3
description: D3 Tree Visualization with Newman API Testing

scripts.test:api: npm run build && newman run build/api-collection.json --reporters cli,html --reporter-html-export newman-reports/newman-report.html
scripts.test:api:verbose: npm run build && newman run build/api-collection.json --reporters cli,html,json --reporter-html-export newman-reports/newman-report.html --reporter-json-export newman-reports/newman-report.json --verbose
